channel.title: SetupDiag on A Square Dozen
channel.description: Recent content in SetupDiag on A Square Dozen

item.title: Windows 10 Feature Updates â€“ Leveraging SetupDiag for Better Reporting
item.description: This is the first post of my Windows 10 Feature Updates series, probably totally out of sequence, but I just need to start getting the pieces written and published. So here goes. What is SetupDiag If you have worked with Windows 10 Operating System Deployments for any amount of time, you’ve likely had failures and encountered cryptic messages that you needed to triage. Hopefully you’ve come across SetupDiag. For the uninitiated, SetupDiag is a fancy little tool from Microsoft that you can run against the Windows installation logs (Panther Logs) either directly on a client or against an offline copy of the Panther logs from another client.
